Alkanet Flower.name: Alkanet Flower
Alkanet Flower.note: Harvested from Alkanet, a fairly common flower in the West Weald.

Aloe Vera Leaves.name: Aloe Vera Leaves
Aloe Vera Leaves.note: Harvested from Aloe Vera, a plant that grows primarily in the Gold Coast.

Ambrosia.name: Ambrosia
Ambrosia.note: Harvested from reddish-purple colored Mana Bloom, a flower that is normally found only in Mankar Camoran's Paradise.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls.

Arrowroot.name: Arrowroot
Arrowroot.note: Harvested from Arrowroot Plant, a plant that is found in the Gold Coast and Nibenay Valley.

Beef.name: Beef
Beef.note: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls.

Bergamot Seeds.name: Bergamot Seeds
Bergamot Seeds.note: Harvested from Bergamot, a flower, particularly common along the Orange Road and near Bravil.

Blackberry.name: Blackberry
Blackberry.note: Food, found in many houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Blackberry Bushes found on some farms and in the wild in the West Weald.

Bloodgrass.name: Bloodgrass
Bloodgrass.note: Harvested from Blood Grass, a common plant in the planes of Oblivion.

Boar Meat.name: Boar Meat
Boar Meat.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. Can also be collected from dead Boars, which are randomly found in many outdoors regions.

Bog Beacon Asco Cap.name: Bog Beacon Asco Cap
Bog Beacon Asco Cap.note: Harvested from Bog Beacon, a plant found in Blackwood.

Bonemeal.name: Bonemeal
Bonemeal.note: Collected from Bones Undead, i.e., skeletons and liches, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons. There is also a rare variant listed below.

Bread Loaf.name: Bread Loaf
Bread Loaf.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls.

Cairn Bolete Cap.name: Cairn Bolete Cap
Cairn Bolete Cap.note: Harvested from Cairn Bolete, a mushroom found in many caves.

Carrot.name: Carrot
Carrot.note: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Carrot Plants, which are found growing on many farms.

Cheese Wedge.name: Cheese Wedge
Cheese Wedge.note: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls.

Cheese Wheel.name: Cheese Wheel
Cheese Wheel.note: Food, less commonly found in houses and dining halls than Cheese Wedges.

Cinnabar Polypore Red Cap.name: Cinnabar Polypore Red Cap
Cinnabar Polypore Red Cap.note: Harvested from red-colored Cinnabar Polypores, a mushroom that grows sparsely in the West Weald.

Cinnabar Polypore Yellow Cap.name: Cinnabar Polypore Yellow Cap
Cinnabar Polypore Yellow Cap.note: Harvested from yellow-colored Cinnabar Polypores, a mushroom that grows sparsely in the West Weald.

Clannfear Claws.name: Clannfear Claws
Clannfear Claws.note: Collected from dead Clannfears, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Clouded Funnel Cap.name: Clouded Funnel Cap
Clouded Funnel Cap.note: Harvested from Clouded Funnel Cap, a mushroom common in mountainous regions (Jerall and Valus Mountains) and Blackwood.

Columbine Root Pulp.name: Columbine Root Pulp
Columbine Root Pulp.note: Harvested from Columbine, a flower that is common in the West Weald.

Corn.name: Corn
Corn.note: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Corn Stalks, which are found growing in many farms.

Crab Meat.name: Crab Meat
Crab Meat.note: Collected from dead Mud Crabs, a common nuisance creature found along water shores and in many dungeons.

Daedra Heart.name: Daedra Heart
Daedra Heart.note: Collected from dead Dremora and Xivilai, both of which are common enemies in the Planes of Oblivion.

Daedra Silk.name: Daedra Silk
Daedra Silk.note: Collected from dead Spider Daedra, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Daedra Venin.name: Daedra Venin
Daedra Venin.note: Collected from dead Spider Daedra, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Daedroth Teeth.name: Daedroth Teeth
Daedroth Teeth.note: Collected from dead Daedroths, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Dragon's Tongue.name: Dragon's Tongue
Dragon's Tongue.note: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue Plants, a flower found in a few clusters south of Bravil and more sparsely throughout the West Weald.

Dreugh Wax.name: Dreugh Wax
Dreugh Wax.note: Collected from dead Land Dreughs, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons at high levels.

Dryad Saddle Polypore Cap.name: Dryad Saddle Polypore Cap
Dryad Saddle Polypore Cap.note: Harvested from Dryad's Saddel [sic] Polypore, a rare mushroom that only grows in a few select locations.

Ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm
Ectoplasm.note: Collected from dead Ethereal Undead, such as ghosts and wraiths, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons.

Elf Cup Cap.name: Elf Cup Cap
Elf Cup Cap.note: Harvested from Elf Cups, a mushroom found growing sparsely in the West Weald.

Emetic Russula Cap.name: Emetic Russula Cap
Emetic Russula Cap.note: Harvested from Emetic Russula, a mushroom found growing sparsely in the West Weald.

Fennel Seeds.name: Fennel Seeds
Fennel Seeds.note: Harvested from Fennel, a plant found primarily in the northern section of the Gold Coast.

Fire Salts.name: Fire Salts
Fire Salts.note: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Flax Seeds.name: Flax Seeds
Flax Seeds.note: Harvested from Flax, a common flower found in the West Weald.

Flour.name: Flour
Flour.note: Commonly found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries, but not technically classified as food).

Fly Amanita Cap.name: Fly Amanita Cap
Fly Amanita Cap.note: Harvested from Fly Amanita, a common mushroom in cities and in the Great Forest.

Foxglove Nectar.name: Foxglove Nectar
Foxglove Nectar.note: Harvested from Foxglove, a common flower in certain parts of the Nibenay Valley and Nibenay Basin.

Frost Salts.name: Frost Salts
Frost Salts.note: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Garlic.name: Garlic
Garlic.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Garlic Clusters (treated as plants), which are found in some houses' basements (especially in Skingrad).

Ginkgo Leaf.name: Ginkgo Leaf
Ginkgo Leaf.note: Cannot be harvested or collected. There are a few guaranteed samples, but otherwise it is randomly found on alchemists and in some containers.

Ginseng.name: Ginseng
Ginseng.note: Harvested from Ginseng Plants, flowers which growly sparsely in the Gold Coast and Nibenay Valley.

Glow Dust.name: Glow Dust
Glow Dust.note: Collected from dead Will-o-the-Wisps, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

Grapes.name: Grapes
Grapes.note: Harvested from Grape Vines, which are abundant in several vineyards outside of Skingrad. Can also be found as food in several houses and dining halls.

Green Stain Cup Cap.name: Green Stain Cup Cap
Green Stain Cup Cap.note: Harvested from Green Stain Cups, a mushroom that is common in several regions, but particularly abundant in Blackwood.

Green Stain Shelf Cap.name: Green Stain Shelf Cap
Green Stain Shelf Cap.note: Harvested from Green Stain Shelf plants, a rare mushroom that is hard to distinguish from the more common Cap variety.

Ham.name: Ham
Ham.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls.

Harrada.name: Harrada
Harrada.note: Harvested from Harrada Root plants, which are common in the Planes of Oblivion, but also possibly hostile.

Imp Gall.name: Imp Gall
Imp Gall.note: Collected from dead Imps, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons at low levels.

Ironwood Nut.name: Ironwood Nut
Ironwood Nut.note: Cannot be harvested, collected, or even bought from alchemists. There are 26 guaranteed samples; otherwise they are found randomly in some containers.

Lady's Mantle Leaves.name: Lady's Mantle Leaves
Lady's Mantle Leaves.note: Harvested from Lady's Mantle, a flower found near Gottlesfont Priory and in the Gold Coast.

Lady's Smock Leaves.name: Lady's Smock Leaves
Lady's Smock Leaves.note: Harvested from Lady's Smock, a flower common in the West Weald.

Lavender Sprig.name: Lavender Sprig
Lavender Sprig.note: Harvested from Lavender, a flower common in the Nibenay Basin.

Leek.name: Leek
Leek.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Leek Plants, which are found growing in a handful of farms.

Lettuce.name: Lettuce
Lettuce.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Lettuce Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

Lichor.name: Lichor
Lichor.note: Harvested from bluish-purple colored Mana Bloom, a flower that is normally found only in Mankar Camoran's Paradise.

Mandrake Root.name: Mandrake Root
Mandrake Root.note: Harvested from Mandrake, a flower found growing in the Colovian Highlands and also near Bravil.

Milk Thistle Seeds.name: Milk Thistle Seeds
Milk Thistle Seeds.note: Harvested from Milk Thistle, a flower found throughout mountainous regions (Jerall and Valus Mountains) and in some clusters in the Gold Coast.

Minotaur Horn.name: Minotaur Horn
Minotaur Horn.note: Collected from dead Minotaurs and Minotaur Lords, two types of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

Monkshood Root Pulp.name: Monkshood Root Pulp
Monkshood Root Pulp.note: Harvested from Monkshood, a common flower in the Heartlands and Nibenay Basin.

Morning Glory Root Pulp.name: Morning Glory Root Pulp
Morning Glory Root Pulp.note: Harvested from Morning Glory, a flowering vine found growing on houses and walls in the West Weald and Heartlands.

Mort Flesh.name: Mort Flesh
Mort Flesh.note: Collected from dead zombies, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons.

Motherwort Sprig.name: Motherwort Sprig
Motherwort Sprig.note: Harvested from Motherwort, a flower common in most regions of Cyrodiil.

Mugwort Seeds.name: Mugwort Seeds
Mugwort Seeds.note: Cannot be harvested or collected. The only way to obtain them is by purchasing them from alchemy vendors, who may randomly have some in stock.

Mutton.name: Mutton
Mutton.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. Can also be collected from some (but not all) dead sheep.

Nightshade.name: Nightshade
Nightshade.note: Harvested from Nightshade Plants, a flower found in the West Weald.

Ogre's Teeth.name: Ogre's Teeth
Ogre's Teeth.note: Collected from dead Ogres, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

Onion.name: Onion
Onion.note: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

Orange.name: Orange
Orange.note: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

Pear.name: Pear
Pear.note: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

Peony Seeds.name: Peony Seeds
Peony Seeds.note: Harvested from Peonies, flowers common in the West Weald.

Potato.name: Potato
Potato.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Potato Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

Primrose Leaves.name: Primrose Leaves
Primrose Leaves.note: Harvested from Primroses, which are flowers occasionally found growing outside various houses and inns.

Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
Pumpkin.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Pumpkin Vines, which are found growing on some farms.

Purgeblood Salts.name: Purgeblood Salts
Purgeblood Salts.note: Mined from Purgeblood Crystal Formations, which are only available as part of Vile Lair.

Radish.name: Radish
Radish.note: Food, found in many houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Radish Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

Rat Meat.name: Rat Meat
Rat Meat.note: Collected from dead rats, a ubiquitous nuisance creature.

Redwort Flower.name: Redwort Flower
Redwort Flower.note: Harvested from Domica Redwort, a flower found growing in several clusters in Blackwood and sparsely throughout the West Weald.

Rice.name: Rice
Rice.note: Food, generally found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries.

Root Pulp.name: Root Pulp
Root Pulp.note: Cannot be harvested or collected. Six guaranteed samples exist; otherwise found randomly in some containers.

Sacred Lotus Seeds.name: Sacred Lotus Seeds
Sacred Lotus Seeds.note: Harvested from Sacred Lotus plants, which are flowers that grow in shallow water.

Scales.name: Scales
Scales.note: Collected from dead slaughterfish, an animal found in deep water, including pools in dungeons.

Scamp Skin.name: Scamp Skin
Scamp Skin.note: Collected from dead Scamps, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Shepherd's Pie.name: Shepherd's Pie
Shepherd's Pie.note: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls. Also available from Eyja in Rosethorn Hall.

S'jirra's Famous Potato Bread.name: S'jirra's Famous Potato Bread
S'jirra's Famous Potato Bread.note: Only available from S'jirra in Faregyl Inn after you have completed The Potato Snatcher. You receive from one to five loaves (based on level) upon completing the quest. You can also return to S'jirra repeatedly to buy more bread, which can then be used for alchemy.

Somnalius Frond.name: Somnalius Frond
Somnalius Frond.note: Harvested from Somnalius Plants, which are found growing in the Great Forest.

Spiddal Stick.name: Spiddal Stick
Spiddal Stick.note: Harvested from Spiddal Stick plants, which are common in the Planes of Oblivion, but also tend to be hostile.

St. Jahn's Wort Nectar.name: St. Jahn's Wort Nectar
St. Jahn's Wort Nectar.note: Harvested from St. Jahn's Wort, a flower most commonly found in the Great Forest.

Steel-Blue Entoloma Cap.name: Steel-Blue Entoloma Cap
Steel-Blue Entoloma Cap.note: Harvested from Steel-Blue Entoloma, a mushroom that is common in the Great Forest.

Stinkhorn Cap.name: Stinkhorn Cap
Stinkhorn Cap.note: Harvested from Stinkhorn, a mushroom that is found in Blackwood.

Strawberry.name: Strawberry
Strawberry.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Strawberry Bushes found on some farms and in the wild in the West Weald.

Summer Bolete Cap.name: Summer Bolete Cap
Summer Bolete Cap.note: Harvested from Summer Bolete, a mushroom found in the Great Forest and Nibenay Valley.

Sweetcake.name: Sweetcake
Sweetcake.note: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls. Sweetcakes are less common than Sweetrolls.

Sweetroll.name: Sweetroll
Sweetroll.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls.

Taproot.name: Taproot
Taproot.note: Collected from dead Spriggans, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

Tiger Lily Nectar.name: Tiger Lily Nectar
Tiger Lily Nectar.note: Harvested from both Tiger Lilies and Lily of the Valleys, two types of flower that are most commonly found in the Great Forest.

Tinder Polypore Cap.name: Tinder Polypore Cap
Tinder Polypore Cap.note: Harvested from Tinder Polypore, a mushroom common in the Valus Mountains.

Tobacco.name: Tobacco
Tobacco.note: Technically treated as a food and can be found in a few houses. It can also be harvested from Tobacco Plants, which are found on several farms.

Tomato.name: Tomato
Tomato.note: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Tomato Plants, which are found growing on many farms.

Troll Fat.name: Troll Fat
Troll Fat.note: Collected from dead Trolls, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

Vampire Dust.name: Vampire Dust
Vampire Dust.note: Collected from dead Vampires, found in a range of vampire dungeons. There is also a rare variant listed below.

Venison.name: Venison
Venison.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be collected from dead deer, which are animals found outdoors throughout Cyrodiil.

Viper's Bugloss Leaves.name: Viper's Bugloss Leaves
Viper's Bugloss Leaves.note: Harvested from Viper's Bugloss, a flower which is abundant in the Great Forest.

Void Salts.name: Void Salts
Void Salts.note: Collected from dead Storm Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

Water Hyacinth Nectar.name: Water Hyacinth Nectar
Water Hyacinth Nectar.note: Harvested from Water Hyacinth, a flower found growing in shallow water.

Watermelon.name: Watermelon
Watermelon.note: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Watermelon Vines, which grow on a few farms.

Wheat Grain.name: Wheat Grain
Wheat Grain.note: Food, found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries. It can also be harvested from Wheat Stalks, which grow on a few farms.

White Seed Pod.name: White Seed Pod
White Seed Pod.note: Harvested from Goldenrod, a flower found in the Gold Coast.

Wisp Stalk Caps.name: Wisp Stalk Caps
Wisp Stalk Caps.note: Harvested from Wisp Stalks, a mushroom that is only found growing underground (i.e., in caves and mines).

Wormwood Leaves.name: Wormwood Leaves
Wormwood Leaves.note: Harvested from Wormwood, a plant found growing in the Jerall Mountains.

Alocasia Fruit.name: Alocasia Fruit
Alocasia Fruit.note: Harvested from Alocasia plants, found in Mania.

Ashen Remains.name: Ashen Remains
Ashen Remains.note: Created from bones using the Crematorium in Ebrocca.

Aster Bloom Core.name: Aster Bloom Core
Aster Bloom Core.note: Harvested from Aster Bloom plants, found in Mania.

Black Tar.name: Black Tar
Black Tar.note: Harvested from Dementia variety Mushroom Tree Saplings and from Black Tar plants.

Blister Pod Cap.name: Blister Pod Cap
Blister Pod Cap.note: Harvested from Blister Pod plants, which are found in Dementia.

Bone Marrow.name: Bone Marrow
Bone Marrow.note: Found on Shambles (50% chance they may yield Bone Shard instead). Also called 'Shambles Marrow.'

Bone Shard.name: Bone Shard
Bone Shard.note: Found on Shambles (50% chance they may yield Bone Marrow instead).

Congealed Putrescence.name: Congealed Putrescence
Congealed Putrescence.note: Harvested from Putrid Gigantea plants, found in Dementia.

Flame Stalk.name: Flame Stalk
Flame Stalk.note: Harvested from Flame Stalk plants, found in Mania caves.

Fungus Stalk.name: Fungus Stalk
Fungus Stalk.note: Harvested from Fungus Stalk plants, found in Dementia.

Grummite Eggs.name: Grummite Eggs
Grummite Eggs.note: Harvested from Grummite Egg Mounds and Grummite Egg Sacs, found primarily in Dementia. May also be found on Grummites (25% chance).

Hydnum Azure Giant Spore.name: Hydnum Azure Giant Spore
Hydnum Azure Giant Spore.note: Harvested from Hydnum Azure plants, found in Mania.

Letifer Orca Digestive Slime.name: Letifer Orca Digestive Slime
Letifer Orca Digestive Slime.note: Harvested from Letifer Orca Planta, found in Dementia. Also called simply 'Digestive Slime.'

Red Kelp Gas Bladder.name: Red Kelp Gas Bladder
Red Kelp Gas Bladder.note: Harvested from Red Kelp, found in Mania. Also called simply 'Gas Bladder.'

Rot Scale.name: Rot Scale
Rot Scale.note: Harvested from Rot Scale, found in Dementia caves.

Screaming Maw.name: Screaming Maw
Screaming Maw.note: Harvested from Screaming Maw plants, found in Mania caves.

Smoked Baliwog Leg.name: Smoked Baliwog Leg
Smoked Baliwog Leg.note: Found as food in shops and houses.

Swamp Tentacle.name: Swamp Tentacle
Swamp Tentacle.note: Harvested from Swamp Tentacle plants, found in Dementia.

Thorn Hook.name: Thorn Hook
Thorn Hook.note: Harvested from Thorn Hook plants, found in Dementia caves.

Unrefined Greenmote.name: Unrefined Greenmote
Unrefined Greenmote.note: Harvested from Mania variety Mushroom Tree Saplings.

Watcher's Eye.name: Watcher's Eye
Watcher's Eye.note: Harvested from Watcher's Eye plants, which grow in Dementia caves.

Water Root Pod Pit.name: Water Root Pod Pit
Water Root Pod Pit.note: Harvested from Water Root Pod plants, which grow in Dementia. Also called simply 'Pod Pit.'

Wisp Core.name: Wisp Core
Wisp Core.note: Harvested from Root Stalks, which grow in Dementia and Mania caves.

Withering Moon.name: Withering Moon
Withering Moon.note: Harvested from Withering Moon plants, which grow in Dementia caves.

Worm's Head Cap.name: Worm's Head Cap
Worm's Head Cap.note: Harvested from Worm's Head plants, which grow in Mania.
